name: hanker
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to have a strong desire for something: I’ve been hankering for a hot dog. [ + to infinitive ] I always hankered to go to Nashville.
hankering noun [ C ] us
Your browser doesn't support HTML5 audio
/ˈhæŋ·kər·ɪŋ/
She’s got a hankering to write plays.
